# 1964 Emperor's Cup final

'''1964 Emperor's Cup Final''' was the 44th final of the Emperor's Cup competition. The final was played at Kobe Oji Stadium in Hy≈çgo on January 17, 1965. Yawata Steel and Furukawa Electric won the championship.
Overview
Yawata Steel and Furukawa Electric won the championship. Yawata Steel was 1st title, Furukawa Electric was 3rd title.
Match details

*1964 Emperor's Cup
